nodes.name: Push lead and message to Smartlead

parameters.text:
=Based on {{ $json.chatInput }} analyse text and attachment to create a summarisation about the company's market, define the ICP, the core values. Define also what are the benefits of the product/service the company is selling.
Try to extrapolate the benefits for the ICPs about this offer.

nodes.name: Get all data bout the lead
Get all data bout the Value propostion

parameters.text:
=Based on this lead's reply : '{{ $('Google Sheets2').item.json.Reply }}'

1. Analyze if the reply is positive or not, meaning if the lead is interested and if we can propose a meeting to him. In any other case, consider the lead as not interested.

2. If the leas is interested, write a message to propose to book a meeting using this link : https://cal.com/my-personal-agenda 

3. If lead is not interested or at least seems not to be and have objections, write a message to try to convinced him, based on the company's brief : '{{ $json['AI synthesis of the business'] }}'
and the objections from the lead's reply. Propose him also to book a call to answer any of his questions.

4. If you feel from the reply the lead is inconvincible and will never buy our product/service. Write a message that you understand what he said and wish him best wishes.

4. Return 2 informations : 
- "reply_signal" = ["positive","to be convinced","inconvincible"] based on the feedback you haev on the lead's reponse.
- "reply_message" = the message you prepared according to the lead's response. Keep this message short. Maximum 150 words !
